TopicTitle: Vessel begins automatic thrusting after time warping

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.5 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windws | CPU: i9 | GPU: 2070 RTX | RAM: 32gb

 

After any amount of time warping vessel automatically begins to thrust when setting back to normal time.  Happens on multiple different craft.
